As Black Friday approaches, shoppers are getting ready for one of the biggest events of the year. The annual sale—falling on November 29—is the ultimate opportunity to save on everything from tech and fashion to home goods and beauty.

Here, we’re giving you a special early preview of four brands set to pull out all the stops, with site-wide discounts, exclusive offers, and extended shopping windows.

In This Article

  1. Vaultskin
  2. Elwood
  3. 7Diamonds
  4. Koio
  5. Tips For Navigating Black Friday

Vaultskin

Dates: 29/11 – 02/12

Cyber Monday Bonus: 3–for–2 deal

Vaultskin, known for its stylish leather wallets and accessories, is delivering a Black Friday promotion that’s not to be missed. The brand’s entire catalog will be marked down by 25% from November 29 until December 2, perfect for those looking for high-quality homes for their cash, cards, and cell.

If you’re looking for a Cyber Monday special, there will also be a 3–for–2 deal; stock up on gifts for the holiday season while treating yourself to a sleek upgrade.

Vaultskin Black Friday Highlights:

  • 25% off sitewide for four days only (Nov 29 – Dec 2).
  • Cyber Monday: Enjoy a 3–for–2 offer for even more value.
  • Ideal for high-quality leather wallets and accessories lovers.

Elwood

Dates: 21/11 – 04/12

Elwood is coming through with one of its most expansive Black Friday sales yet, offering 30% off everything. Known for its vintage-inspired essentials, the brand is a go-to for cozy, modern basics.

With a nearly two-week-long sale, Elwood fans have plenty of time to shop and find the best deals on their favorite styles. From classic sweatshirts and hoodies to jeans and outerwear, this discount applies to everything site-wide, allowing you to refresh your wardrobe or shop for holiday gifts at a significant discount.

Elwood Black Friday Highlights:

  • 30% off everything for an extended sale period (Nov 21 – Dec 4).
  • Great for finding deals on stylish, everyday essentials.
  • Ideal for stocking up on basics or trying out new seasonal pieces.

7Diamonds

Dates: TBC

Shop smart and snag standout style with the 7Diamonds Black Friday deal. This premium menswear brand, celebrated for its carefully crafted shirts and elevated casual wear, is set to offer 30% off everything.

With timeless pieces that blend style and comfort, you’ll save on shirts, polos, sweaters, and much more. There’s also plenty of women’s designs, so you can finally start addressing that Christmas list.

7 Diamonds Black Friday Highlights:

  • 30% off sitewide.
  • Perfect for snagging upscale casual wear with a discount.
  • Don’t miss out on this once-a-year opportunity

KOIO

Early Access: November 15 – November 17
Black Friday Sale: November 18 – November 26
Cyber Monday: Additional discounts on selected items

KOIO, a brand beloved for its Italian-made luxury sneakers, is kicking off Black Friday with early access from November 15 to November 17, where shoppers can enjoy 15% off sitewide and up to 70% off selected styles.

The official Black Friday sale opens to everyone on November 18 and runs until November 26, offering even more ways to save on some of the most sought-after sneakers and footwear styles.

For Cyber Monday, KOIO will roll out extra discounts, giving fashion-savvy shoppers plenty of reasons to check back.

KOIO Black Friday Highlights:

  • Early Access: 15% off site-wide from Nov 15 – Nov 17.
  • Black Friday Sale: Up to 70% off selected styles from Nov 18 – Nov 26.
  • Cyber Monday: Extra discounts on select items.

Tips for Navigating Black Friday 2024

With brands rolling out extended sales, it’s easy to feel overwhelmed. Here are a few tips to help you get the most out of Black Friday and Cyber Monday this year:

  • Plan ahead by listing your must-have items. Check back on the brand websites to make sure that you’re ready when the sales begin.
  • Sign up for early access if available, especially for brands like KOIO that offer early Black Friday deals. Early access often means that you get first dibs on popular items.
  • Set notifications for one-day-only sales that have limited-time deals on Black Friday itself.
  • Follow social media for last-minute discounts and updates, as some brands may drop additional flash sales or stock alerts.
